attributes.action: make party manifestos include specific actions which will be legally binding and oblige parties to include the date by which the actions will be carried out, or face a general election. General statements of intent should be declared in a seperate section.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If I buy a kettle that says it will boil a litre of water in 5 minutes and it fails to do so, then I can take it back immediately. If I vote in a party on the grounds that it has promised to do certain things on my behalf and it fails to do so, I cannot vote them out until they decide to hold a general election. If people could trust politicians to carry out their election promises, then I feel more people would vote and we would have a much more democratic state.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
